# authentik_stage_deny (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create deny stage, can be used with policies

resource "authentik_stage_deny" "name" {
  name = "deny"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `deny_message` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `meta_app` (String) Static value of `authentik_stages_deny` Generated.
- `meta_model` (String) Static value of `denystage` Generated.
